text: Kanal Kireedam is a 2002 Indian Malayalam film, directed by K Sreekuttan, starring Napoleon (actor) and Sangita in the lead role. http://www.filmibeat.com/malayalam/movies/kanal-kireedam.html ==Cast== * Napoleon * Jose Prakash * Sangeetha * Master Jithin * Madhupal * Babu Namboothiri * Bindu Panicker * NF Varghese * Poojappura Ravi * Spadikam George * Sreeram ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Kanal Kireedam
